tool.name: split fasta on sample ids
tool.description: Split a single post-split_libraries.py fasta file into per-sample fasta files.

param.label: -i/--input_fasta_fp: the input fasta file to split
param.name: input_fasta_fp

param.label: --buffer_size: the number of sequences to read into memory before writing to file (you usually won't need to change this) [default: 500]
param.name: buffer_size

tool.help: Split a single post-split_libraries.py fasta file into per-sample fasta files. This script requires that the sequences identitifers are in post-split_libraries.py format (i.e., SampleID_SeqID). A fasta file will be created for each unique SampleID. This script will produce an output directory with as many files as samples.
